summary: This script provides an end‑to‑end example for training and using a DreamBooth‑style personalized text‑to‑image diffusion model with NVIDIA NeMo. It configures the trainer, loads a Megatron‑based Stable Diffusion model, prepares optional regularisation data, runs fine‑tuning on user‑provided images, and demonstrates inference to generate customized images from prompts.
business_intent: Enable developers and researchers to quickly adapt large diffusion models for personalized image generation, facilitating custom content creation and prototyping of DreamBooth workflows.
